title: Teen Open Studio: Pop Factory
short_description:
“Art is what you can get away with,” at least according to Andy Warhol. Join us for art making inspired by his Pop Art!

For more information about teen programs, please call (312) 857-7161 or email teens@artic.edu. For upcoming teen programs, please visit the teen programs calendar.
description:
“Art is what you can get away with,” at least according to Andy Warhol. Join us for art making inspired by his Pop Art!

For more information about teen programs, please call (312) 857-7161 or email teens@artic.edu. For upcoming teen programs, please visit the teen programs calendar.

To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or send an email to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible. 

Please see the museum’s Accessibility page for more information.
